Conduction.card_desc: [Recharge] Reduce the cooldown of Recharge by {scale=0.5|0.5}s.

Field Study.card_desc: [Protection] Allies affected by Protection gain an additional 30% damage while shielded.

Glyph of Freedom.card_desc: [Armor] Eliminations reduces all active cooldowns by {scale=8|8}%.

Glyph of Health.card_desc: [Armor] Increase your base maximum Health by {scale=150|150}.

Rune Torrent.card_desc: [Nullify] Gain {scale=2|2} ammo per second while using Nullify.

Scribe's Wit.card_desc: [Nullify] Reduce the Cooldown of Nullify by {scale=1|1}s.

Thanks, Grandpa.card_desc: [Protection] Increase the duration of Protection by 2s.

Timeshaper.card_desc: [Protection] Reduce the cooldown of Protection by {scale=0.5|0.5}s.

Winddancer.card_desc: [Protection] Protection grants {scale=10|10}% Movement Speed to its target for 2s.
